alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 1:03AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CHST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 200 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 103 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.8 and 1.4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
